turkish_example_sentence: Biz mülteci ailelere yeni evlerinin taşınmasında yardım etmişsek gurur duyarız
english_example_sentence: If we had helped refugee families with moving to their new homes, we would feel proud
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы помогли семьям беженцев с переездом в их новые дома, мы бы гордились
